item.title: Other Duties as Assigned: Recapping My Nancy Drew Summer
item.description: It’s up to you as Nancy Drew… Did you know that between 1998 and 2015, the video game company HER Interactive released 32 Nancy Drew PC point-and-click adventure games? If you’ve spent any time with me in real life, then you definitely know about them, since I love them and talk about them constantly. I very regularly start a sentence with “Well, there’s this one Nancy Drew game where…”
